description:
Hibiki`s mother, Fuuka, knows everything about her son, to the point where Breakin and Adeline decide she must be a ninja! Then, when Hibiki`s class takes a field trip to a ninja castle, Fuuka is possessed by a Dance Stone. It will take Flash Beat everything he has to restore his mother to her old self!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Dancing Lady Ninja! Mom`s Secret?!
踊るくの一! 母さんのヒミツ!?
